ygData.subject: Re: Operation Time! (Eek!)
ygData.msgSnippet: I hope the operation comes out allright, Teltoli. And don t worry about us, get some rest after the operation. We can wait .. I think. ... me ... the ... head

I hope the operation comes out allright, Teltoli. And don't worry 
about us, get some rest after the operation. We can wait .. I think.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, steph_teltoli@m... wrote:
> I have some sad.. and very distressing news. Well - distressing to 
me 
> anyway. (LOL) Tomorrow, I'm going in for an operation that'll last 
> about an hour.. I think. ^_^
> 
> Sooo I'm probably not gonna be on the computer tomorrow, or maybe 
the 
> next day, I'm not sure. It all depends if I'm stubborn enough, or 
> just going into withdrawl on the Internet. *grin* 
> 
> Either that or I'll be so crabby with this big bandage round my 
head 
> that I won't want to talk to anyone anyway.. 
> 
> Carnage, feel free to act Teltoli as you see fit.. ^_^
> 
> Okay... so wish me luck on the operation, and hopefully I'll be 
able 
> to talk to you soon! :)
> 
> 
> Steph F. Geeves
> SGC Funny-Farm ListMom
> 
> "We're not your Classic Hero's.. we're the other guys"
>             - "Mystery Men"
